website_summaries.verdict: This overlocking machine is capable of 3 or 4 thread overlocking for high-quality edges and hems.
pros: If you find yourself sewing hems often, this overlocking machine is designed to do the job quickly and with a durable, clean result
Threading is straightforward, and the foot pedal is responsive and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't really thought I needed an overlocker until my daughter said she had used one at her sewing class and how much faster it was than zig-zagging raw edges to achieve a professional finish on garments. The machine arrived pre-threaded, but I decided to have a go at threading it myself; threading the lower looper is a bit fiddly, but with the help of the instructional DVD, I managed it without too much swearing! It really is a great piece of kit at a decent price. I suspect it's going to get used rather a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Great make And fairly compact machine.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to get your head round an overlocker but I’ve really enjoyed using it. There’s lots of helpful YouTube videos too to help with troubleshooting and advice which was a massive help at the start as I had to keep re threading one of the strands but I soon worked out how to re thread and sort the tensions out. I also bought some extra spools from amazon which you just tied on to the end of the existing thread- makes Chang spools so easy. Janome is such a reliable make too and most sewing shops service and repair janome machines. My other machines are janome and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B.

customer_reviews.title: A great machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's Christmas box. She was scared of it at first, two months before getting out of the box then hey presto, she used it and loved it. The next hurdle is to learn how to rethread it.
customer_reviews.author: Grenville Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic first time overlocker
customer_reviews.text: This entry level overlocker has opened up a whole new world of sewing for my wife. Threading is easy due to the coloured routes and the cutter is crisp given professional results
customer_reviews.author: Simon P Booth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little machine, 5 ⭐
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lovely little machine. I had never used an overlocker before, but since my mum asked for one for Christmas, I bought her this one. Its fantastic. It comes pre threaded, with a DVD and instruction manual. Easy to thread, quiet and doesnt take up too much space. Me and my mum now fight to use it. I wouldn't go without it now. Try one for yourself. I would highly recommend it! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sam Walker

customer_reviews.title: But first use we did already we can describe as awesome. Pre-loaded threads is good help for begginers
customer_reviews.text: Our first overlock ever, we can't compare. But first use we did already we can describe as awesome. Pre-loaded threads is good help for begginers. Only standard set of accessories could be richer.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hamorsky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, colour coordinated threading system - makes me feel like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted that my overlocker arrived already threaded so all I had to do was look to see which thread went where. A useful back up was the instructional dvd which I watched a couple of times. And the fact that the threading is colour coordinated meant that even I couldn’t go wrong! I’m delighted with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and great after sale service
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A bit fiddly threading up but really great at giving that professional finish to your makes. Would definitely recommend buying from BSK in Bedford. Super friendly staff who really pulled out all the stops to get the overlocker sent to me directly from Janome and even called me to let me know it was on its way. Now that's what I call good service.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen McCarney

customer_reviews.title: Why did I not buy one sooner???
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine to learn how to sew knitted jersey garments. The machine came pre-threaded which was great as I could get started on the fun bit straight away. I have been absolutely loving using it. It sews really smoothly and I haven't had any issues other than my own inexperience! Making garments is so quick and the finish is professional looking, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. Connell

customer_reviews.title: excellent results
customer_reviews.text: I found it tricky to thread one thread, the video was not as helpful as it could be. On the other hand, the machine arrived with all threads in ready to use, which was great!
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't find it easy to adjust the stitching and it dances off the table if you don't hold onto it. Tricky
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for speeding up the production os scrubs
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and could be used straight away! It will sew through anything at speed. It was tricky to re thread but there are plenty of on line videos and it comes with a CD. It is easy to do after the first time. I wish I had bought it at the start of the pandemic as its made my life easier in making scrub bags, masks hairbands etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good overlocker if it was not someone else’s return.
customer_reviews.text: Had awful problems with the tension and things catching on foot. It was a replacement for an ancient but almost identical overlocker that stopped working. I suspect it was someone else’s return due to box being resealed, small part missing and minor things that were only noticeable when a replacement arrived that was brand new and never opened.
customer_reviews.author: I Like to be Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great machine - gives professional finish
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant new toy! Gives a professional finish to garments I have made for my daughter - fast delivery - takes a little patience threading the needles but once threaded runs like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Hodgy

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great overlocker and easy to use,makes my sewing look very professional.It was delivered much quicker than I thought. Great service from order to delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had had no previous experience with overlockers but I found it was very easy to follow. I am sewing scrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Londoner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant overlocker, definitely value for money and glad I bought it from Amazon, super fast delivery as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant and very easy to use. I am so pleased I finally got round to buying an overlocker.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd overlocker after over 40 yrs of sewing and this one by far is the best. Very smooth running machine
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: Love the simplicity It does jump about a bit at higher speeds
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This overlocker is great. I use a industrial one at work and this is really easy to use for learning on
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Louise Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use and gives a professional finish to home made clothes.
customer_reviews.author: j m rogers

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Noisy very rattly, fidly to thread looper . Plasticy not like metal ones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so good - both my wife and our granddaughter say that ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good - both my wife and our granddaughter say that they are delighted with it :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this sewing machine for me and I love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 9300DX the must have machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine for price does what it says on the box and more good purchase bargain price
customer_reviews.author: Sueyco

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous machine!
customer_reviews.text: Having become frustrated with my old cheap, overlocker, I decided, since I make many of my own clothes, to buy a new one. Janome was recommended so I opted for this model 9300DX. As soon as I took it out of the box & tested a fabric sample, I was over the moon! It worked perfectly on different fabrics - even georgette - without having to alter the tension or other settings. Unlike other machines reviewed, it is quiet but is solid enough not to move on the table. I cannot praise it highly enough. As an added bonus it came within two days of the order.
customer_reviews.author: Sheilams

customer_reviews.title: I can only find high-end overlockers (for double the price) and so this is good value. I've been making baby dresses and have ..
customer_reviews.text: Where I live, I can only find high-end overlockers (for double the price) and so this is good value. I've been making baby dresses and have been using the zigzag stitch to neaten seams but they just don't look good. Now I am getting so much pleasure from making outfits and I've started making dresses for myself. I bought this model also because it's featured in The Overlock Technique Manual, which I bought first to decide whether I should get an overlocker. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My girl says this has changed her life
customer_reviews.text: My girl says this has changed her life and she is very very happy. Good instuctions on threading it, although it comes pre threaded when you get it. Easy to use. Great support should you get in a tangle, but this doesn't happen often.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Boyes

customer_reviews.title: A great buy - I think this will last me for years!
customer_reviews.text: I paid FULL PRICE for this item, I DID NOT receive a discount for my review - I bought this in June 2016, its December now and I use it at least once a week. Its just as you'd expect from a Janome product. Solid, hard working, and easy to use - also there are lots of really useful videos on YouTube to help you get the most out of it. If you are toying with getting something else, I'd recommend this one as that's what I was doing when I purchased it and haven't regretting it since
customer_reviews.author: MSMG

customer_reviews.title: ... used it as too much but so far so good. It smooth and easy to adjust and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not had this 12 months yet and not used it as too much but so far so good. It smooth and easy to adjust and the instructions are nice and clear. Re threading is a little complicated but that is typical of an over locker, however diagrams and guides are on the machine to help with this. A very nice little machine
customer_reviews.author: Miss turner

customer_reviews.title: janome overlocker
customer_reviews.text: I read all reviews about overlockers and decided on this one. I'm so glad I did as it's absolutely brilliant. It sews so neatly and finishes everything off so well. I can't rate it high enough!
customer_reviews.author: jacamax

customer_reviews.title: Janome 9300DX Overlocker ...
customer_reviews.text: Great overlocker, can fault it, it is quite heavy to carry, and overlockers are every bit as complicated to thread as I was told, but after a few goes, I have mastered it. I bought it because I was led to believe that the foot pedal could be interchanged with my Janome sewing machine, but of course it can't, it would not be that simple, however that is a minor point. The sewing results from it are very professional and I am a real amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. Y. O. Connor

customer_reviews.title: This Product Lasts The Distance
customer_reviews.text: You should note I purchased this 5 years ago in December and it’s still going strong so as I was reviewing another purchase and noticed I had not reviewed this I thought it unfair when it’s been a very pleasing purchase. It’s been able to handle all the fabrics I have tried, the threading is easy just push the thread into the guide and through the lower looper then follow the colour coded guides on the threading path, I find the built in rolled hem feature handy and it’s very stable and quiet unlike other overlockers I have used for a surprisingly light machine. It’s used on a weekly basis and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kalbo

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: As this is the 1st overlocker I have bought or ever used ( bought to compliment my Janome sewing machine which I love) I was very nervous using it for the 1st time. Followed the instructional DVD which is very good. Found rethreading a bit difficult for the loopers. Overall I feel it is an excellent item but will take getting used to so i need to keep using it
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Hjghly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Easy to use and to thread up. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tixylixy

customer_reviews.title: Great overlocker, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great overlocker. Professional finish and sturdy enough for Jersey too. Easy set up, quiet. Heavy enough so doesn't move on the table. Cannot fault this machine. Very good quality and very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and on time. Still getting to grips with it, but have made my first dress using it. Instructional DVD would not play on my computer (new computer), but was able to see it on the tv. Happy with my purchase. Came with a free gathering attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a beast
customer_reviews.text: I am going on a course to learn how to use my overlocker. All I can do at the moment is overlock a seam but it does so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Pol

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Lightweight and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Compact, Lightweight and easy to use. With added bonus of being pre-threaded. Would have been 5* if it had a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Susan Bromfield

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight excellent machine ( according to my friend)
customer_reviews.text: I personally haven’t used mine yet, but I have a friend who has the same model and she swears it’s the best, which is why I purchased one
customer_reviews.author: ariom

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine , practiced threading few times to get used to it, I enjoy using it
customer_reviews.author: Carol Saville

customer_reviews.title: This Janome Overlocker really gives a professional finish to my sowing and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it works and easy to use and this my first Overlocker. I have always wanted one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife who is over the moon with it
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Certainty was not disappointed. Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: I own a Janome sewing machine and after reading reviews for the Overlocker I bought it. Certainty was not disappointed. Excellent machine.
customer_reviews.author: John Docherty

customer_reviews.title: Value for money and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The DVD’s was very helpful and the delivery was prompt. It does what it says on the can. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great over locking machine,glad it was threaded ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: harry shipman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Delighted with results and DVD is very helpful indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R

customer_reviews.title: Overlocker and GUR
customer_reviews.text: This machine was purchased to replace an eleven year old model, because it was too heavy. It does a superb job, is fairly light weight, IE; I can lift it easily, basically it is perfect for my requirements. The delivery from GUR was first class .
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic I've always used Janome and needed a spare so went for this cheaper one to use whilst my other was being serviced and I much prefer this one now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had better but that was along time ago and it was 40yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

product_meta.title: Janome 9300DX Plus Threads & FREE Gathering Attachment. GUR New Years Offer Price £259. While Stocks Last.
product_meta.description: Includes Threads & FREE Gathering Attachment! (202036007) The Janome 9300DX Overlocker is one of the easiest overlockers with speeds up to 1300 stitches per minute. It features electronic control and an easy Upper Knife release. An instructional DVD ensures that you'll be overlocking with professional results in no time. The Janome 9300DX has 2 needles and 3 or 4 thread stitching capabilities. It's equipped with a differential feed (adjustable from .05 to 2.25) and an adjustable cutting width. This provides increased control for handling most types of fabrics and is essential for creative overlock techniques. Threading is simplified by colour-coded thread guides. You can also switch quickly to rolled hemming without changing the needle plate. The Janome 9300DX is the easiest way to get fast professional results. Accessories Included: Needles (Ballpoint), Screwdriver (Large), Screwdriver (Small), Standard Foot, Tweezers, Gathering Attachment, Inst

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
